advertisements.title: Financial assistance for our brothers and sisters
advertisements.description:
üôè Financial assistance for our brothers and sisters who fell victims in the recent flashflood and typhoon that hit Moalboal, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay üíô
Each beneficiary received 1 sack of rice and ‚Ç±1,000, assisted by LDRRMO, Sir George Caraba√±a and MSWDO, Maam Sonia Ofancia. This was headed by our ever-supportive Mayor Riorita Castillo, together with Hon. Dino Ramos.
A small gesture, but a big help in these challenging times. Salamat, Mayor and Hon. Dino, sa inyong malasakit! üåæ‚ú®
DONRIO Martinez 
#DasigTitay

advertisements.title: The Dasig Titay Scholarship Program
advertisements.description:
Ang edukasyon kay usa ka adbokasiya duol sa akong kasing-kasing
 These are the words heartily expressed by the Municipal Mayor of Titay, Hon. Riorita Martinez Castillo, as they officially launched the Dasig Titay Scholarship Program, an initiative that highlights the unwavering commitment of our Honorable Mayor and the Local Government Unit of Titay, to promote education and empower the future of our community.
The Dasig Titay Scholarship is designed to offer meaningful opportunities to deserving students, supporting them in reaching their academic goals. 
It stands as a symbol of our local leaders‚Äô dedication to nurturing progress and development in Titay.

advertisements.title: FLAG CEREMONY | First Monday of September
advertisements.description:
Today, we gathered once again for our traditional first Monday flag ceremony, honoring our nation and renewing our commitment to public service. üôå
The ceremony was graced by Municipal Mayor, Hon. Riorita Martinez Castillo, whose leadership and presence continue to uplift and guide our community. 
We are also honored by the presence of Former Mayor of Titay and Board Member, Hon. Maria Ezperanza Corazon Rillera Hadjula, whose continued support and dedication to our community inspire us all. üíö

advertisements.title: Honored to witness the Live Fire Exercise
advertisements.description:
Honored to witness the Live Fire Exercise with 105mm Howitzers of the Charlie Battery, 1st Field Artillery Battalion, Philippine Army in Tungawan, Zamboanga Sibugay.
Our very own Mayor Riorita Martinez Castillo also participated in this significant event, showing strong support for our troops and our shared mission of peace, security, and development. üáµüá≠‚ú®

advertisements.title: LDRRMO TITAY 25th Gawad KALASAG
advertisements.description:
Congratulations to the Local Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Council of the Municipality of Titay for their outstanding achievement in the 25th Gawad KALASAG Seal and Special Awards! Your invaluable contribution to Disaster Risk Reduction and Management and Humanitarian Assistance truly makes a difference. ‚ÄãThis recognition highlights your dedication to community safety and resilience.‚Äã
A special commendation goes to Sir George D. Caraba√±a Jr. and Jose Mario Angelo A. Villarosa for proudly representing the Municipality of Titay and accepting this prestigious award.

advertisements.title: OATH OF DUTY | Barangay Malagandis
advertisements.description:
OATH OF DUTY | Barangay Malagandis, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay
We congratulate Hon. Edgardo T. Enong for officially taking his Oath of Office as Barangay Kagawad. With his pledge of commitment to serve with integrity, dedication, and loyalty to the Constitution of the Republic of the Philippines, we look forward to his meaningful service to the community. üôè‚ú®

advertisements.title: Dasig Titay Distribution of Water Dispensers!
advertisements.description:
Distribution of Water Dispensers, check! 
The distribution of water dispensers was finally ticked off the Mayor‚Äôs checklist yesterday, at Titay Central Elementary School grounds. This initiative was a promise made by Hon. Mayor Riorita Martinez-Castillo on her special day, and it serves as a manifestation of her respect, admiration, and support to our educators. 
This marks the start of greater things ahead. Under her administration, Mayor Rio remains committed in ensuring that everyone is included and supported in every way possible and feasible. 
Together, we will achieve more for Titay!

advertisements.title: The 2025 Civil Society Organization (CSO) Conference
advertisements.description:
The 2025 Civil Society Organization (CSO) Conference was successfully conducted on August 15, 2025, at the Conference Hall, 3rd Floor, Municipal Hall, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay. This activity was held in accordance with DILG Memorandum Circulars (MC) 2022-083, 2021-054, and 2025-060, which provide guidelines on CSO accreditation and participation in Local Special Bodies.
A total of 60 CSOs from various organizations and associations attended the activity. The success of the conference was made possible through the leadership of Hon. Riorita M. Castillo, RPh., Municipal Mayor, with the support of Atty. Renato Martinez, Municipal Administrator, and the dedicated efforts of Ms. Annie R. Torres, AO-V/CSO Focal, in collaboration with Ms. Cleofe B. Luna, ENP, MPDC, Ms. Angelita Calixton-Narciso, MLGOO, and Engr. Eleazer S. Ricaborda, President of the Titay People‚Äôs Council.
The 2025 CSO Conference successfully strengthened the partnership between the Local Government Unit (LGU) of Titay and the accredited CSOs. It also enhanced the participants‚Äô understanding of accreditation guidelines, participatory governance, and their vital role in shaping local development policies and programs

advertisements.title: Dasig Titay Blood Donation
advertisements.description:
In celebration of the of the 125th Anniversary of the Philippine Service, a mass donation was conducted at the Municipality of Titay. The activity was held at Titay Municipal Hall last September 2, 2025.
The event was graced by Municipal Mayor, Hon. Riorita Martinez-Castillo. She extends her gratitude to all our dedicated volunteers, health workers, LGU staff, and brave donors for making this life-saving mission possible. 
Truly, heroes are not only found in capes, but also in those who give life through blood.

newsArticles.title: ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS
PNP | Campaign Against Illegal Drugs
newsArticles.summary:
At about 9:00 AM of September 11, 2025, PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, COP, Titay MPS together with BDCP PNCO of this station, attended the Municipal Anti-Drug Abuse Council (MADAC) and Municipal Peace and Order Council (MPOC) Meeting. During the meeting, PMAJ ESPARES presented the Operational Accomplishments of Titay MPS particularly on the Focus Directives such as the Campaign Against Illegal Drugs, Arrest of Wanted Persons, and Loose Firearms. PMAJ ESPARES tackled strategies and goals for improving public safety and to enhance quality service to the community. PMAJ ESPARES also aims to build and maintain public trust through integrity, professionalism, and a strong connection with the community to ensure a safer and drug-free community.
#SaBagongPilipinasAngGustongPulisLigtasKa
#ToServeandProtect

Precautionary Measures for Tropical Depression (TD)

newsArticles.title: PNP | ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS (Buy-bust) OPERATION:
newsArticles.summary:
ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS (Buy-bust) OPERATION:
At about 4:13 AM of September 9, 2025, MDET of Titay MPS led by PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP conducted drug Buy-bust operation at Barangay San Antonio, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay Province that resulted in the arrest of one male suspect and confiscation of the following items:
a. Five (5) pcs small heat-sealed transparent plastic sachets containing white crystalline substance suspected to be shabu with an estimated weight of 1 gram with SDP of Php 6,800.00; 
b. One (1) unit android mobile phone model Realme with cellphone case,color violet ( used as container )
c. One (1) pc Five-Hundred-peso bill (Marked Money) with serial number AE4241391.
Confiscated drug evidence was brought to Zamboanga Sibugay Provincial Forensic Unit for Qualitative and Quantitative examination, while the suspect was brought to Titay MPS for proper disposition and appropriate filing of case thru inquest proceeding.

newsArticles.title: BFP | ùêàùêçùêïùêÑùêçùêìùêéùêëùêò ùêéùêÖ ùêèùêÑùêëùêíùêéùêçùêçùêÑùêã, ùêèùêëùêéùêèùêÑùêëùêìùêò ùêÄùêçùêÉ ùêÑùêêùêîùêàùêèùêåùêÑùêçùêì ùüêùüéùüêùüì
newsArticles.summary:
The Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP)  Annual Inventory Team 2025, composed of Commissioned and Non-Commissioned Officers from the BFP Regional Office IX in coordination with Representatives from the Commission on Audit, conducted a comprehensive inventory of personnel, property, and equipment at Titay Municipal Fire Station, Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
The annual inventory of personnel, property, and equipment in the Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP) Region IX ensures accountability and compliance with Commission on Audit (COA) guidelines. It verifies the proper recording, condition, and completeness of government-issued assets, including uniforms and equipment, while identifying shortages or damages for timely action. This process promotes transparency, efficiency, and operational readiness across the organization

newsArticles.title: TITAY MPS NEWS
newsArticles.summary:
At about 11:50 AM of September 10, 2025, personnel of Titay Municipal Police Station led by PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP, facilitated the voluntary deposited of one (1) unrenewed firearm described as:
One (1) unit caliber .45mm Taurus (PT145 PRO ‚Äì Serviceable) Pistol, with Serial Number: NEP97981, with one (1) magazine loaded with five (5) rounds of live ammunition of same caliber that expired on March 28, 2023.
The said firearm was deposited by one male individual, married, driver by occupation, and a resident of Barangay Poblacion Muslim, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
The said firearm is now under the custody of Titay MPS for proper disposition.
